snippet: Nepal’s chief judge was sworn in as head of an interim government Thursday morning in an effort by the country’s squabbling political parties to hold new elections.
abstract: Nepal's Supreme Court Chief Justice Khil Raj Regmi is sworn in as head of interim government in effort by country’s squabbling political parties to hold new elections.

byline.contributor: Prateek Pradhan contributed reporting from Katmandu, Nepal.

lead_paragraph: Nepal’s chief judge was sworn in as head of an interim government Thursday morning in an effort by the country’s squabbling political parties to hold new elections.

headline.seo: Leadership Change in Nepal Stirs Hopes of Stability
headline.main: Leadership Change in Nepal Stirs Hopes of Stability
headline.print_headline: Nepal: Accord Aims to Ease Deadlock
